sentences.sContent: In the meantime, you have to insulate yourself from his moods.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the meantime, you have to insulate yourself from his moods.
sentences.sCn: 同时，你必须将你自己隔绝在他的情绪之外。

sentences.sContent: But how, in the meantime, should we approach our personal consumption?
sentences.sContent_eng: But how, in the meantime, should we approach our personal consumption?
sentences.sCn: 但同时，我们应该如何处理个人消费问题呢？
